info.name: Pioneer DDJ-REV1
info.author: LauraRozier
info.description: Midi Mapping for the Pioneer DDJ-REV1

control.description: SHIFT - press - Shift key state for the script
BROWSE - rotate - Scroll tracklist/tree view
BROWSE + SHIFT - rotate - Scroll tracklist/tree view fast
BROWSE - press - Play/Stop preview for selected track
BROWSE + SHIFT - press - Play/Stop preview for selected track
LOAD (DECK1) - press - Load a Track into Deck 1
LOAD + SHIFT (DECK1) - press - Eject the Track from Deck 1
LOAD (DECK2) - press - Load a Track into Deck 2
LOAD + SHIFT (DECK2) - press - Eject the Track from Deck 2
LOAD (DECK3) - press - Load a Track into Deck 3
LOAD + SHIFT (DECK3) - press - Eject the Track from Deck 3
LOAD (DECK4) - press - Load a Track into Deck 4
LOAD + SHIFT (DECK4) - press - Eject the Track from Deck 4
PLAY/PAUSE (DECK1) - press - Play/Pause
PLAY/PAUSE + SHIFT (DECK1) - press - Stutter
CUE (DECK1) - press - Set/Call Cue, Back Cue
CUE + SHIFT (DECK1) - press - Jump to track start
JOG DIAL PLATTER Vinyl mode On (DECK1) - rotate - Scratch
JOG DIAL PLATTER Vinyl mode Off (DECK1) - rotate - Pitch bend
JOG DIAL PLATTER + SHIFT (DECK1) - rotate - Search (Fast Pitch bend)
JOG DIAL PLATTER (DECK1) - touch - enable (on touch) / disable (on release) Scratching/Pitch bend
JOG DIAL PLATTER + SHIFT (DECK1) - touch - enable (on touch) / disable (on release) highspeed Pitch bend
JOG DIAL SIDE (DECK1) - rotate - Pitch bend
TEMPO (DECK1) - fader - Tempo control LSB
TEMPO (DECK1) - fader - Tempo control MSB
BEAT SYNC (DECK1) - press - Beat Sync to Master deck
BEAT SYNC + SHIFT (DECK1) - press - Set as Master deck
DECK SELECT LONG PRESS (DECK1) - press - Change Tempo range
RELOOP/EXIT (DECK1) - press - (loop off) Reloop, (loop on) Loop exit
RELOOP/EXIT + SHIFT (DECK1) - press - Reloop and stop
1/2X (DECK1) - press - Loop off: Halves beatloop size; Loop on: Halve the current loop size
1/2X + SHIFT (DECK1) - press - Loop off: Set beatloop-in position; Loop on: Hold to move beatloop-in position
2X (DECK1) - press - Loop off: Doubles beatloop size; Loop on: Doubles the current loop size
2X + SHIFT (DECK1) - press - Loop off: Set beatloop-out position; Loop on: Hold to move beatloop-out position
PLAY/PAUSE (DECK2) - press - Play/Pause
PLAY/PAUSE + SHIFT (DECK2) - press - Stutter
CUE (DECK2) - press - Set/Call Cue, Back Cue
CUE + SHIFT (DECK2) - press - Jump to track start
JOG DIAL PLATTER Vinyl mode On (DECK2) - rotate - Scratch
JOG DIAL PLATTER Vinyl mode Off (DECK2) - rotate - Pitch bend
JOG DIAL PLATTER + SHIFT (DECK2) - rotate - Search (Fast Pitch bend)
JOG DIAL PLATTER (DECK2) - touch - enable (on touch) / disable (on release) Scratching/Pitch bend
JOG DIAL PLATTER + SHIFT (DECK2) - touch - enable (on touch) / disable (on release) highspeed Pitch bend
JOG DIAL SIDE (DECK2) - rotate - Pitch bend
TEMPO (DECK2) - fader - Tempo control LSB
TEMPO (DECK2) - fader - Tempo control MSB
BEAT SYNC (DECK2) - press - Beat Sync to Master deck
BEAT SYNC + SHIFT (DECK2) - press - Set as Master deck
DECK SELECT LONG PRESS (DECK2) - press - Change Tempo range
RELOOP/EXIT (DECK2) - press - (loop off) Reloop, (loop on) Loop exit
RELOOP/EXIT + SHIFT (DECK2) - press - Reloop and stop
1/2X (DECK2) - press - Loop off: Halves beatloop size; Loop on: Halve the current loop size
1/2X + SHIFT (DECK2) - press - Loop off: Set beatloop-in position; Loop on: Hold to move beatloop-in position
2X (DECK2) - press - Loop off: Doubles beatloop size; Loop on: Doubles the current loop size
2X + SHIFT (DECK2) - press - Loop off: Set beatloop-out position; Loop on: Hold to move beatloop-out position
PLAY/PAUSE (DECK3) - press - Play/Pause
PLAY/PAUSE + SHIFT (DECK3) - press - Stutter
CUE (DECK3) - press - Set/Call Cue, Back Cue
CUE + SHIFT (DECK3) - press - Jump to track start
JOG DIAL PLATTER Vinyl mode On (DECK3) - rotate - Scratch
JOG DIAL PLATTER Vinyl mode Off (DECK3) - rotate - Pitch bend
JOG DIAL PLATTER + SHIFT (DECK3) - rotate - Search (Fast Pitch bend)

2X + SHIFT (DECK3) - press - Loop off: Set beatloop-out position; Loop on: Hold to move beatloop-out position
